summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Law, Police, and Municipal Court Departments, transferring certain functions, positions, and personnel to the Law Department; ratifying execution of a Memorandum of Agreement with International Federation of Professional and Technical Employees, Local 17, to release its exclusive bargaining rights for positions transferred; and increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1991 budgets of such departments by reappropriation and transfer from the Department of Finance General and declaring the emergency therefor.
